data.summary: The Linear Trend Forecast model demonstrates excellent performance (R²=0.999) with minor underestimation bias. Historical trends show consistent production growth that the model successfully captures. Residual analysis confirms random error distribution with only 5.7% extreme outliers.
data.task_answer: The Linear Trend Forecast model predicts crop production for 2024-25 with high accuracy (R²=0.999, MAE=5.818). Historical trends show consistent growth, and the model's residuals indicate reliable predictions with minor underestimation bias. The forecast for 2024-25 follows this established trend pattern.
